title: Target freshers to halt spread of meningitis, say researchers

title_detail.value: Target freshers to halt spread of meningitis, say researchers

summary: A campaign targeted at students arriving at university for the first time could hold the key to reducing the spread of meningitis and septicemia, say researchers in England.

summary_detail.value: A campaign targeted at students arriving at university for the first time could hold the key to reducing the spread of meningitis and septicemia, say researchers in England.
